lemma nsplitTree_invpres: "\<lbrakk> is_leveln_ftree n (s:: ('e,'a::monoid_add) FingerTreeStruc); is_measured_ftree s; \<not> p i; p (i + (gmft s)); (nsplitTree p i s) = (l, nd, r)\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> is_leveln_ftree n l \<and> is_measured_ftree l \<and> is_leveln_ftree n r \<and> is_measured_ftree r \<and> is_leveln_node n nd \<and> is_measured_node nd "
